column5: Well our Son came home for the weekend to do a little fishin as he's not been out all year and goin crazy.  OK I guess I better put him on fish or I'll never hear the end of it---No pressure for the old guy.  Well we did real good....14-16 fow---weed flats----coon tail good---duck weed sucked.  Soft jerkbaits were the ticket.  Here's a couple--his personal best largie..
good job  My girls are young,maybe one day the will come home some with pics like that!
